description: Represent a ml pipeline graph analysis.

analyses.description: The list of analysis chained to this analyzer analysis.
analyses.title: analyses

detections.description: The list of detections the analyzer returned.
detections.title: detections

duration.description: The time taken by the analyzer.
duration.title: duration

matchingDetections.description: A list of detections that matches the detection matchers criteria set on analyzers, triggering their execution.
matchingDetections.title: matchingDetections

skippedReason.description: The reason the analyzer was skipped.
skippedReason.title: skippedReason

title: Analysis
